title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.70 - Current assets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.70 - Current assets

State Regulations

Unrestricted cash, or other assets held for conversion
within a relatively short period into cash or other readily convertible asset, or currently useful goods or services. Usually the period is one year or less; however, in some enterprises the period may be extended to the length of the
operating cycle, which may be more than a year. The five customary subdivisions
of current assets are cash, temporary investments, receivables, inventory, and
prepaid expenses. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.70

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
